Uses of Class
application.Position

    • Uses of Position in application

      Subclasses of Position in application 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Vertex
      A class for representing a vertex and its associated normal.
      Methods in application that return Position 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Position Rotation.getAcc()
      Gets the acceleration of the rotation, has an acceleration of each component
      Position CustomObject.getAcc()
      gets the acceleration of the object
      Position CustomObject.getCenterOfMass()
      Gets the center of mass of the object in actual space, not relative to the object.
      Position Material.getKa()
      Gets the ambient colour value of the material
      Position Material.getKd()
      Gets the diffuse colour of the material
      Position Material.getKs()
      Gets the specular colour of the material
      Position CustomObject.getLastCol()
      Gets the position of the last collision
      Position CustomObject.getPosition()
      Gets the position of the object
      Position Camera.getPosition()
      Gets the cameras position in the world
      Position Rotation.getVel()
      Gets the velocity of the rotation, has a velocity of each component
      Position CustomObject.getVel()
      Gets the velocity of the object
      Methods in application with parameters of type Position 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void CustomObject.rotateAboutPoint(Position relativePoint, double xRot, double yRot, double zRot)
      Rotates the object about a point given an x axis rotation, y axis rotation, z axis rotation and the position of the point relative to the object.
      void Rotation.setAcc(Position inpAcc)
      Sets the acceleration of the rotation, has an acceleration of each component
      void CustomObject.setAcc(Position inpAcc)
      Sets the acceleration of the object

      Sets the ambient colour value of the material

      Sets the specular colour of the material

      Sets the position of the last collision
      void CustomObject.setPosition(Position inpPosition)
      Sets the objects position to the one input
      void Vertex.setTextureCoords(Position textureCoords)
      Sets the texture coords x, y and z to the values in inpNormal
      void Rotation.setVel(Position inpVel)
      Sets the velocity of the rotation, has a velocity of each component
      void CustomObject.setVel(Position inpVel)
